devdoc.details: This contract lives on L1. It sends L1->L2 messages into L2, and relays L2->L1 messages from L2 to their target on L1.

params._message: Message to send to the target.
params._proof: Inclusion proof for the given message.

params._gasLimit: Gas limit for the provided message.
params._message: Message to send to the target.

params._gasLimit: Gas limit for the provided message.
params._message: Message to send to the target.

devdoc.title: OVM_L1CrossDomainMessenger

constructor.notice: Pass a default zero address to the address resolver. This will be updated when initialized.

relayMessage(address,address,bytes,uint2.notice: Relays a cross domain message to a contract.

replayMessage(address,address,bytes,uint.notice: Replays a cross domain message to the target messenger.

sendMessage(address,bytes,uint32).notice: Sends a cross domain message to the target messenger.
